event.description: Fred Lewis walks.
With Edgar Renteria batting, Fred Lewis steals (2) 2nd base.
Edgar Renteria pops out to second baseman Orlando Hudson.
Pablo Sandoval grounds out, second baseman Orlando Hudson to first baseman James Loney. Fred Lewis to 3rd.
Bengie Molina strikes out on a foul tip.
Randy Winn walks.
Aaron Rowand singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Mark Loretta. Randy Winn to 2nd.
Emmanuel Burriss grounds out, pitcher Jeff Weaver to first baseman James Loney. Randy Winn to 3rd. Aaron Rowand to 2nd.
Jeff Weaver intentionally walks Travis Ishikawa.
Tim Lincecum out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Matt Kemp. Randy Winn scores. Aaron Rowand to 3rd.
Fred Lewis hit by pitch. Travis Ishikawa to 2nd.
Edgar Renteria walks. Aaron Rowand scores. Travis Ishikawa to 3rd. Fred Lewis to 2nd.
